title: I'm Looking to Buy a Baseball Card, Subject to the Following Stipulations...
author: leftygrove10

posts.post_title: I'm Looking to Buy a Baseball Card, Subject to the Following Stipulations...
posts.post_content:
******************************
Edited to Add:

I found three cards, each within my specified price range.  See my thread at the bottom to see what I got.  Thanks to everyone who emailed me!
******************************


Good morning!  I thought I would have some fun this weekend.  I want to buy a baseball card, subject to the following stipulations:

1.  I am not willing to spend more than $50

2.  The baseball card must have great eye appeal and must be in at least Good condition (no pin holes, no paper loss, etc)

3.  The baseball card must have been issued in 1925 or before

4.  The baseball card must have color (I do not want a black and white card)

5.  The baseball card CANNOT be from one of the following sets:
E90
E91
E121
M116
T3
T201
T202
T205
T206
T207
T210
T212
C46
Cracker Jack
1919 Zeenut
1920 Zeenut
1925 Zeenut
W514

Please email a scan with your price, or post them here.  My email address is [url]brad_green@cox.net[/url].  I will make a decision on the purchase no later than 9 pm (EDT) on Labor Day.

Thanks!

Brad

Brad,
How about a stamp?
I have a Helmar stamp of Chance I could let go for $50. I can send you scan if you wish.

Joshua

posts.post_title: Did you end up buying anything?
posts.post_content:
I thought this was a cool post, and am curious about what you picked, if anything.

Luke

I picked up a picture as a result of my post, but haven't bought anything yet that satisfies my list above.  I did get several responses, though.  I did get a response for a pin, which I'm still considering.

If you have anything that I might be interested in, feel free to email me.

I wanted to finish off this thread by saying that I found three cards, each within my price range.  The cards are as follows:

t213-2 1914 Mowry
e95 Maddox
v61 Neilsons Type 2 Hack Miller

Thanks to everyone who emailed me!
